msgSnippet: I personally do, but I view this added complexity as the cost of adding flexibility to my system. I m willing to pay for testability with a little complexity,

I personally do, but I view this added complexity as the cost of adding
flexibility to my system. I'm willing to pay for testability with a little
complexity, since it gives me a far more robust system in the end. These
factories also help me break the dependencies between concrete classes,
regardless of test code, which gives me a better, more loosely coupled
system as well.

bab

Brian Button       bbutton@...

St. Louis, MO      http://www.objectmentor.com

> "need a factory"  Do you find that factories which exist to

subject: RE: [junit] Question.
